products.description: Comprehensive payment processing platform that enables businesses to accept online and in-person payments globally. Helps companies of all sizes simplify payments management, reduce fraud, and grow revenues through a seamless checkout experience. Offers scalable solutions with extensive payment method support and global compliance.

Subscription and recurring billing platform that automates invoice creation, payment collection, and revenue recognition. Ideal for businesses managing subscription models or invoiced payments, enabling flexible pricing and payments with built-in tax calculation and customer management. Supports complex payment arrangements and streamlined revenue operations.

Payments platform designed for marketplaces and platforms to route funds between multiple parties efficiently and securely. Supports onboarding, compliance, and global payouts for businesses that facilitate transactions between sellers and buyers. Enhances transactional transparency and simplifies payment flows for complex, multi-party ecosystems.

Fraud detection and prevention solution that uses machine learning to identify and block fraudulent transactions in real-time. Helps businesses reduce chargebacks and losses while improving customer trust and payment security. Easily integrates with the Stripe payments platform for automated fraud management at scale.

End-to-end platform enabling entrepreneurs and startups to quickly incorporate a US-based company, open a bank account, and get legal and tax guidance. Simplifies business formation and global expansion for startups and new ventures. Accelerates company launch while ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements.

Card issuing platform that allows businesses to create, manage, and distribute physical and virtual cards for expense management, customer rewards, or disbursements. Supports real-time controls to prevent fraud and enables custom card programs to optimize spend visibility and streamline workflows.

In-person payment solution providing hardware and software for accepting card payments face-to-face with seamless integration to Stripe’s online platform. Designed for businesses with physical locations to deliver consistent payment experiences across channels. Offers secure, fast transactions with built-in reporting and connectivity.

Business financing product offering fast, flexible funding based on payment processing history. Helps eligible Stripe merchants access capital to grow operations, manage cash flow, and invest in new projects with simple repayments tied to revenue. Provides a convenient alternative to traditional loans with streamlined application.

Sustainability-focused product enabling businesses to contribute a fraction of their revenue toward carbon removal projects. Helps companies meet environmental goals by integrating climate investments directly into payment flows. Provides transparency on carbon impact and supports corporate social responsibility efforts.

Automated tax calculation and collection solution for businesses selling goods and services globally. Simplifies VAT, GST, and sales tax compliance with real-time rate determination, tax reporting, and filing support. Enables accurate tax handling across multiple jurisdictions to reduce compliance burdens and errors.

Banking-as-a-service product that lets platforms and marketplaces embed financial services, including bank accounts, money movement, and cash management. Helps businesses offer integrated financial features to customers, improving engagement and operational efficiency. Built with trusted banking partners for regulatory compliance.

Online identity verification platform that helps businesses confirm customer identities quickly and accurately. Supports KYC, fraud prevention, and regulatory compliance with AI-powered document verification and biometric checks. Ideal for onboarding customers securely while reducing manual review workloads.

Prebuilt, hosted payment page optimized for conversion with support for multiple payment methods and currencies. Enables businesses to offer a seamless and secure checkout experience without custom development. Scales easily from startups to enterprises and integrates fully with Stripe’s payments ecosystem.
